channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: L’écran des Pixel 10 a un gros problème depuis la dernière mise à jour d’Android 16
item.description: Les Pixel de Google ont été mis à jour début décembre et globalement, les retours sont positifs. Sauf ceux des utilisateurs touchés par ce bug pénible.

item.title: Qobuz teams up with indie music mag Drowned in Sound to produce 6 months of artist-first podcasts — and I can’t wait to tune in
item.description: Qobuz's Drowned in Sound collab will bring 6 months of artist-first podcasts to discerning music-lovers

item.title: LinkedIn wants every user to be verified
item.description: LinkedIn hits 100 million verified accounts on its platform, but the goal is to verify everyone.

item.title: Facebook et Instagram : bientôt moins de publicités ciblées pour les Européens
item.description: Les utilisateurs de Facebook et d’Instagram auront bientôt accès à un nouveau réglage leur permettant de réduire le nombre de publicités ciblées présentes dans ces applications. L’arrivée de cette nouvelle option est prévue pour le mois de janvier. C'est la conséquence d’une amende infligée à Meta au printemps.

item.title: Soundpeats H3 Review: Triple-Driver Wireless Earbuds
item.description: You don’t need to be an audiophile to appreciate how great these buds sound.

item.title: You can now text photos directly to Aura’s digital picture frames
item.description: It's now easier for friends and family who aren't tech savvy or are struggling with app fatigue to share images via your Aura digital photo frame. As the name of the new "text to frame" feature implies, photos can now be shared to an Aura frame through a text message, and they will be automatically […]

item.title: Tech's biggest losers of 2025
item.description: It’s the end of another year, so it’s time for the Engadget staff to compile a list of the year’s biggest losers. We scour over articles from the previous 12 months to determine the people, companies, products and trends that made our lives worse over the course of the year. Some selections may be so pervasive they actually make our list of biggest winners. But, for the most part, we’re confident you’ll share in our collective rage over the biggest losers of 2025.OpenAIOpenAI CEO Sam Altman delivers a speech with video at the SK AI Summit 2025 at COEX in Seoul, South Korea on November 3, 2025 ...

item.title: The Xbox controller I hold dearest is at a simply ridiculously low price right now at Amazon
item.description: For the love of game pads, please buy my favorite Xbox controller ever at this ridiculously low price that has to be a mistake.

item.title: Nouveau record mondial : pourquoi les futures voitures électriques chinoises seront encore plus difficiles à plier
item.description: Le constructeur chinois Chery et le sidérurgiste HBIS viennent d'annoncer un sacré pas en avant concernant la sécurité des voitures. Leur nouvel acier thermoformé affiche une résistance impressionnante, dépassant le record mondial détenu jusqu'ici par Xiaomi et sa voiture électriqu. Mais quels sont les avantages concrets pour l'utilisateur ?

item.title: Ce smartphone fin en promo à moins de 300 € sur Amazon a tout pour plaire, mais les stocks sont très limités
item.description: Si vous cherchez un bon smartphone au form factor fin, le Motorola Edge pourrait être le candidat idéal. Surtout avec cette réduction sur Amazon qui le fait passer de 499 euros à 299 euros.

item.title: Empromptu raises $2M pre-seed to help enterprises build AI apps
item.description: Empromptu claims all a user has to do is tell the platform's AI chatbot what they want — like a new HTML or JavaScript app — and the AI will go ahead and build it.

item.title: Under-16s social media ban lands in Australia
item.description: Australian teens are now locked out of the most popular social media apps. Here's how the platforms are complying with the new rules

item.title: One of Fortnite's most hated weapons is making a comeback this week in OG
item.description: Epic Games has confirmed that the overpowered Infinity Blade will return in Fortnite OG this week.

item.title: « Je n’ai pas l’intention de partir de sitôt » : l’architecte des puces Apple silicon est là pour rester, une excellente nouvelle pour vos futurs Mac
item.description: Retournement de situation chez Apple. Johny Srouji, l'architecte des puces Apple Silicon, resterait au sein de la firme de Cupertino.

item.title: EU opens antitrust investigation into Google's AI practices
item.description: Google is no stranger to scrutiny from government bodies such as the US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA), and the European Commission. Now it can add another probe to its list: The European Commission has opened an antitrust investigation into the company surrounding the content used for its AI tools. Namely, the Commission is looking into two things, starting with whether Google used web publisher's content for its AI Overview and AI Mode services — without "appropriate compensation" or the option to "refuse" the use of their materials. "The Commi...

item.title: Freebox Ultra, Freebox Pop ou Freebox Révolution Light ? Quelle box internet Free choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: Avec ses Freebox performantes, esthétiques et dotées de fonctionnalités exclusives, sans compter le rapport qualité-prix, Free s'est longtemps démarqué sur le segment des forfaits internet. Nous allons voir ici quelles Freebox sont aujourd'hui au catalogue.

item.title: Ads aren’t coming to Gemini, Google says — but OpenAI has shown that the inevitable is coming
item.description: A new report suggests Gemini could be getting ads very soon, but Google denies there is any validity in the rumors.

item.title: Meta promises to reduce data sharing for EU users by 2026 to avoid EU GDPR fines
item.description: After being hit with a €200 million DMA fine in the EU, Meta has agreed to change its ads policy.

item.title: Première mondiale | Les Australiens de moins de 16 ans bloqués sur les réseaux sociaux
item.description: Les moins de 16 ans d’Australie sont officiellement interdits d’accès à de nombreux réseaux sociaux depuis mercredi matin, une démarche pionnière au niveau mondial qui vise à protéger la jeunesse des algorithmes addictifs d’Instagram, TikTok ou encore Snapchat.

item.title: 01net Awards : la meilleure montre connectée de 2025 est…
item.description: La rédaction de 01net.com désigne les meilleurs produits de l’année. Découvrez tous les jours les vainqueurs de chaque catégorie jusqu’à la remise des prix le 10 décembre, en live s’il vous plait !

item.title: Pourquoi il est urgent que les français achètent des voitures électriques : le rapport choc de RTE
item.description: Acheter une voiture électrique n'est pas seulement un geste écologique. Cela permet également de payer moins cher son énergie. Le dernier rapport de RTE sur le sujet est clair : si les ventes de voitures électriques ne décolle pas, une double peine attend les Français.

item.title: The Game Awards 2025 will feature a Tomb Raider announcement — tune in to see ‘the future of one of gaming's most iconic franchises’
item.description: A special event in Fortnite has revealed that something Tomb Raider-related will be announced during The Game Awards on Thursday. Here's what we know.

item.title: This Asus controller comes with a screen, and right now it's cheaper than ever
item.description: The Asus ROG Raikiri Pro controller is down to its lowest-ever price at Amazon right now — save 40%.

item.title: Apple's AirPods Pro 3 are back to an all-time low price
item.description:
No need to fret if you missed out on some of the best Black Friday deals this year — some of them have returned already. Case in point: Apple's AirPods Pro 3, which came out in September this year, are back down to $220. That's an all-time-low price and the same discount we saw during Black Friday and Cyber Monday. With the new AirPods Pro, Apple made some big improvements, including better battery life and sound quality, and introduced useful new features, such as Live Translation.
The AirPods Pro 3 are the best AirPods available today, with Apple's H2 chip, and earned a score of 90 out of ...

item.title: NVIDIA can now sell its high-end AI chips to 'approved customers in China,' Trump says
item.description: NVIDIA is now allowed to sell its second-best H200 processors to China, rather than just the sanction-approved H20 model that China had previously declined to buy, President Trump wrote on Truth Social. The United States will collect a 25 percent tariff on those sales, the Commerce Department confirmed yesterday. Trump said that he informed China's President Xi Jinping of the decision and that he "responded positively." The Commerce Department is finalizing details and the administration will take the same approach with AMD, Intel and other US companies. He added that the administration would...

item.title: Yes, ‘Starfleet Academy’ Is Bringing the Actual ‘Voyager’ Doctor Back to Life
item.description: Plus get a tiny glimpse of 'Supergirl' ahead of its first trailer this week.

item.title: How to Shop for a Mechanical Keyboard (2025): Switches, Materials, and Layouts Explained
item.description: Want to wade into the world of mechanical keyboards? We break down the terminology, phrases, and materials to make the experience less overwhelming.

item.title: iFixit Put a Chatbot Repair Expert in an App
item.description: FixBot can check on the health of your devices and talk you through necessary repairs. You can even point your phone's camera at broken gear to get started.

item.title: iFixit’s FixBot helps with repairs ‘the way a master technician would’
item.description: DIY repair site iFixit has launched its own app for iOS and Android, featuring its extensive library of repair guides and resources, a battery health monitor, and a new AI "FixBot" tool that's been trained on those same guides to help with repairs. The heart of the new app is the company's existing library of […]

item.title: iFixit’s new app uses AI to help you repair your stuff
item.description: We’ve all been there: You can’t (or won’t) get help when something breaks, but the YouTube clip doesn’t cover your specific issue. It’s what repair gurus at iFixit want to solve with FixBot, an AI-enabled app that talks you through whatever repair you’re doing. The chatbot will help you diagnose the problem and then walk you step-by-step through the fix. Plus, it’s voice-enabled so you won’t have to get your phone all smeary when you’re elbows-deep in a job. After all, iFixit’s guides don’t just cover fixing your electronics, but everything you might fancy doing yourself, from appliances throu...

item.title: The year age verification laws came for the open internet
item.description: When the nonprofit Freedom House recently published its annual report, it noted that 2025 marked the 15th straight year of decline for global internet freedom. The biggest decline, after Georgia and Germany, came within the United States.Among the culprits cited in the report: age verification laws, dozens of which have come into effect over the last year. "Online anonymity, an essential enabler for freedom of expression, is entering a period of crisis as policymakers in free and autocratic countries alike mandate the use of identity verification technology for certain websites or platforms, m...

item.title: Citroën et Decathlon présentent une voiture électrique unique : comme un air de Multipla, mais encore plus pratique
item.description: Après Oli, voici Elo, le nouveau concept-car de Citroën. Avec 6 passagers dans la longueur d’une C3 et des astuces conçues avec Decathlon, cette voiture électrique vient présenter la vision du futur de la marque.

item.title: Almost 40% off! Don't miss this SteelSeries Arctis Nova 1 gaming headset deal
item.description: This SteelSeries gaming headset would make for the perfect gift at its current discounted price.

item.title: Personne ne veut de Copilot ? Microsoft contraint de revoir ses ambitions IA à la baisse
item.description: Microsoft pourrait revoir ses objectifs financiers à la baisse concernant l'IA. En cause ? Un manque d'intérêt de la part du public pour Copilot.

item.title: IKEA quietly launches a new smart light – and it's the simplest and most affordable one yet
item.description: IKEA's newest gadget is the Gömpyssling light and sensor, and it won't cost you much money at all.

item.title: There’s only one Netflix anime movie you need to stream this Christmas — and it’s not KPop Demon Hunters
item.description: Sure, KPop Demon Hunters is the obvious choice for an anime movie binge this Christmas, but don't forget about another tremendous Netflix movie.

item.title: Walmart stock is making a historic change today. Here’s why WMT is moving from the NYSE to the Nasdaq
item.description: In a bid to appear more technology-forward than its competitors, the retail giant will trade on the same exchange as the Magnificent 7. It’s a historic day for both Walmart and the Nasdaq. Today, America’s largest brick-and-mortar retailer begins trading on the Nasdaq after its shares spent over half a century on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE). Here’s what you need to know about Walmart’s move to the Nasdaq....

item.title: TikTok is blissing out on the dancefloor with Jon Hamm
item.description: If you've noticed Jon Hamm perpetually blissing out on your TikTok FYP to "Turn the Lights Off", join the club.

item.title: Amazon Offloads Eureka’s Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo at an All-Time Low for Holiday Clearance
item.description: There's no reason you should have to spend time vacuuming your home.

item.title: 21 Best Gifts for Cooks (2025): Vitamix, Frying Pans, Air Fryers
item.description: From the best air fryer to frying pans to knife sharpeners anyone can use, these ideas will keep the curious home chef in your life tinkering away.

item.title: Samsung, Apple, and Google Phones Are Practically Free as Mint Mobile Extends Its Black Friday Promo Longer Than Planned
item.description: Switch to Mint Mobile's unlimited talk and text and high-speed data for just $15 per month and add one of these great phones at incredible prices, now through Dec. 31.

item.title: The best HBO Max deals and bundles in December 2025
item.description: In December 2025, HBO Max is offering bundle deals with its service so you can stream excellent shows and movies at a discounted price.

item.title: Après Fossil, c’est fini pour cette marque de montres Wear OS ? Les indices ne trompent pas
item.description: Les indices s'accumulent : stocks vides sur Amazon, site officiel épuré... Mobvoi semble délaisser ses montres TicWatch, malgré une promesse de support.
